Content:: The Badische Zeitung (Baden Newspaper) is a German newspaper based in Freiburg im Breisgau, covering the South Western part of Germany and the Black Forest region. It has a circulation of 145,825 and a readership of 409,000.[1] The paper was founded in January 1946.[2]  This German newspaper-related article is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
Title: Badische Zeitung - Wikipedia
